adrFormatAddress: Downstairs/Purple Gate, 2208B Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text:
Erica is the epitome of professionalism, skill, respect and personality.

She was incredibly communicative throughout the entire booking process and curated an incredibly welcome atmosphere during our first appointment.

I felt right at home the entire time, and as a plus, she dropped a lot of really helpful hair education on me throughout the appointment .

Definitely will be coming back!

text.text:

originalText.text: Erica is simply the best! A true hidden gem! She is extremely gentle and patient when taking care of her clients' hair. She will not put anything in your hair if she believes that it will damage your hair, even if you insist. In addition to being a great hairdresser, she's also a wonderful person with a wonderful personality. It was a blessing to find such an amazing hair care professional.

text.text: Erica is simply the best! A true hidden gem! She is extremely gentle and patient when taking care of her clients' hair. She will not put anything in your hair if she believes that it will damage your hair, even if you insist. In addition to being a great hairdresser, she's also a wonderful person with a wonderful personality. It was a blessing to find such an amazing hair care professional.

originalText.text: Erica is wonderful. I needed my hair done for a shoot I was doing with Northface for my hiking group and she really did a great job on my hair. I was going to another stylist who was not at all concerned about the health of my hair. Erica let me know, cleaned up my parts, wrapped and repaired a few of my locs. I had literally not seen my locs look that good in all the 2.5 years of having them. Very thankful and will keep going back.

originalText.text: Erica is a hair-care professional who goes above and beyond for her clients. She is punctual and knows how to style and protect hair so that you can enjoy your preferred style without damaging your hair. In addition to providing excellent service, she is a constant professional.who values her client's hair and time. I highly recommend Erica's services!

text.text: Erica is a hair-care professional who goes above and beyond for her clients. She is punctual and knows how to style and protect hair so that you can enjoy your preferred style without damaging your hair. In addition to providing excellent service, she is a constant professional.who values her client's hair and time. I highly recommend Erica's services!

originalText.text:
Erica has been my stylist for several years.  She knows hair!  When you go to see Erica you are her focus. Her services are by appointment only.  This enables her to give you her undivided attention. Erica is concerned about your hair’s overall health.  Her passion for haircare is clear.

I encourage you to schedule a consultation.  That gives her time to examine your hair and scalp condition.  Thereby enabling Erica to recommend the course treatment for your hair health.  At the same time she will customize a style for you so that leave the shop ready to slay.

Lastly, Erica’s prices are more than reasonable for the quality of work(wo)manship that goes in the services she provides.  I’ve had crochet styles, weaves, Mohawks, silk presses, custom wigs, and much provided by Erica.  Every penny spent was worth it.  Yes, I can go to some hacks and haggle for a cheaper price, but if you’re seeking professional hair care with a skilled craftswoman at the helm, you need to book your consultation with Erica.

Lastly, Erica’s prices are more than reasonable for the quality of work(wo)manship that goes in the services she provides.
